mapper.insert: insert into experienceTB(title, subject, service, main_img, mCategory, sCategory, area, kindN, kindI, kindS, kindH, headCount, missionm condi, startDate, endDate) values (#{title}, #{subject}, #{service}, #{main_img}, #{mCategory}, #{sCategory}, #{area}, #{kind_n}, #{kind_i}, #{kind_s}, #{kind_h}, #{head_count}, #{content}, #{condition}, #{start_date}, #{end_date})
